Package org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.slice

Class SliceElement

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.slice.SliceElement
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class SliceElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
A SliceElement is a decorated set of states in a slice. See Slice for more information.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SliceElement​(StateSet e1, Decoration e2)
    Constructor with a set of states in this slice element and a decoration for this slice element.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    SliceElement clone()  
    Decoration getDecoration()
    Returns the decoration of this slice element.
    StateSet getStates()
    Returns the set of states of this slice element.
    boolean isCheckPoint()
    Returns true if this slice element is to be checked to ensures the fair termination when the cut-point optimization is on.
    void setCheckPoint​(boolean b)
    Sets true if this slice element is to be checked to ensures the fair termination when the cut-point optimization is on.

    Sets the decoration of this slice element.

  • Constructor Details

    • SliceElement

      public SliceElement​(StateSet e1, Decoration e2)
      Constructor with a set of states in this slice element and a decoration for this slice element.
      Parameters:
      e1 - the set of states
      e2 - the decoration indicating whether the branches below this slice elements will be infinite or finite

  • Method Details

    • isCheckPoint

      public boolean isCheckPoint()
      Returns true if this slice element is to be checked to ensures the fair termination when the cut-point optimization is on.
      Returns:
      true if this slice element is to be checked to ensures the fair termination when the cut-point optimization is on

    • setCheckPoint

      public void setCheckPoint​(boolean b)
      Sets true if this slice element is to be checked to ensures the fair termination when the cut-point optimization is on.
      Parameters:
      b - a boolean indicating if this slice element is to be checked to ensures the fair termination when the cut-point optimization is on
